To buy and store Shiba Memu tokens, you must have a top-rated, secured wallet that can connect to the Ethereum network. If you are buying SHMU on your smartphone, we recommend using Trust Wallet as it has a simple interface that is easy to navigate, secure and offers direct access to decentralized exchanges like Uniswap. If you are buying SHMU on your desktop, we recommend using MetaMask.

How to Set Up Trust Wallet

Here’s a snapshot overview of how to set up Trust Wallet on your phone so that you can safely buy and store Shiba Memu tokens.

Step 1. Download Official Trust Wallet App

Trust Wallet is a mobile wallet app backed by the Binance exchange. You can obtain the app via Play Store and App Store – or access the download link on the Binance website.

Step 2. Create Wallet

You will now be asked if you already have a Trust Wallet or if you wish to create a new one. Click the ‘Create a Wallet’ button to create a new one.

Step 3. Backup Passphrase

Carefully note down your 12-word backup passphrase. Next, you must manually type the 12 words in the correct sequence so that Trust Wallet knows you have recorded the backup passphrase correctly. If your phone is lost or stolen, the only way for you to regain access to your Trust Wallet funds will be by entering this backup passphrase.

Step 4. Add Shiba Memu Token

Now that Trust Wallet is set up on your mobile device, you can add Shiba Memu tokens. Do this by clicking the “+” icon on top-right of the screen, followed by ‘Add Custom Token’ at the very bottom of the list. Your network will be selected as ‘Ethereum’ by default.

Step 5. Paste Shiba Memu Contract Address

Paste your SHMU token contract address found on your Shiba Memu deposit page so that the Trust Wallet can locate your account. Double-check the contract address pasted. We recommend verifying your SHMU contract address using the official Shiba Memu Telegram group.

The blank fields will now populate with the correct contract specifics for Shiba Memu – such as the name, symbol, and number of decimals.

That’s it. You have now successfully set up a Trust Wallet. You can connect your Trust Wallet directly to Uniswap and buy/store your Shiba Memu tokens through a single app.
